[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Mercy - Brett Young
[00:06.88]Written by：Brett Young
[00:13.77]Mercy
[00:14.47]
[00:17.10]Why you gotta show up looking so good just to hurt me
[00:21.16]
[00:23.54]Why you wanna stop this whole damn world from turning
[00:27.57]
[00:30.34]Mercy
[00:31.24]
[00:33.60]Why you hanging on so tight if this ain't working
[00:37.61]
[00:40.25]Why you wanna stop this flame if it's still burning
[00:44.30]
[00:45.93]Cause it's still burning
[00:47.69]
[00:50.15]So if you're gonna break my heart just break it
[00:54.00]
[00:56.84]And if you're gonna take your shot then take it
[01:00.81]
[01:01.59]Take it
[01:03.94]If you made up your mind then make it
[01:07.55]
[01:08.15]Make this fast
[01:10.32]

[01:14.44]
